/admin/api/register.name: Register User

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username of the user to register.

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: The password of the user to register.

/admin/api/register.example:
<form action="/admin/api/register" method="POST">
    <input type="text" name="username" />
    <input type="password" name="password" />
</form>

responses.description: Only authenticated users can use this endpoint.

/admin/api/login.name: Login User
notes: This endpoint always redirects the user, regardless of input.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username of the user to log in.

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: The password of the user to log in.

/admin/api/login.example:
<form action="/admin/api/login" method="POST">
    <input type="text" name="username" />
    <input type="password" name="password" />
</form>

responses.description: Redirect to /admin/login?error=auth_err. Authorization failed for an unknown reason.
Redirect to /admin/portal. User logged in successfully.
Redirect to /admin/login. User logged out successfully.

/posts.name: Retrieve Posts
notes: Articles returned from this API may be cached...
/posts.description: Get all articles by page & type.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page to retrieve. Each page has a max of 12 articles.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of articles to retrieve.

responses.description: No articles found with the specified query.

/admin/api/get_article.name: Retrieve Article
/admin/api/get_article.description: This endpoint retrieves a single article by ID and type.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the article to retrieve.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of articles to retrieve.

responses.description: Only authenticated users can use this endpoint.
No articles found with the specified query.

/admin/api/articles_without_content.name: Retrieve Article Data
/admin/api/articles_without_content.description: This endpoint returns all articles by type with only the title and ID.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of articles to retrieve.

responses.description: Only authenticated users can use this endpoint.
